title: $:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-tiddler-info
author: oeyoews
name: Tiddlywiki Tiddler Info
text:
{"tiddlers":{"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-tiddler-info/readme":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-tiddler-info/readme","text":" * Show Tiddler Info * note: reoverwrite [[$:/core/ui/ViewTemplate/subtitle]] tiddler "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-tiddler-info/icon":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-tiddler-info/icon","text":" ","type":"image/svg+xml"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-tiddler-info/info-config":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-tiddler-info/info-config","text":"\define tid() $:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-tiddler-info/config
Change Emoji Icon
created <$edit-text tiddler=<> field="ocreated" placeholder="👉" tag="input"/>
modified <$edit-text tiddler=<> field="omodified" placeholder="📝" tag="input"/>
description <$edit-text tiddler=<> field="odescription" placeholder="✅" tag="input"/>
tags <$edit-text tiddler=<> field="otags" placeholder="🏷️" tag="input"/>
username <$edit-text tiddler=<> field="ousername" placeholder="username" tag="input"/>
user image <$edit-text tiddler=<> field="ouserimage" placeholder="gravatar.png" tag="input"/>
"},"$:/core/ui/ViewTemplate/subtitle":{"title":"$:/core/ui/ViewTemplate/subtitle","tags":"$:/tags/ViewTemplate","text":"\define tid() $:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-tiddler-info/config <$reveal type="nomatch" stateTitle=<> text="hide" tag="div" retain="yes" animate="yes">
<$list filter="[all[current]has[creator]]"> <$avatar width=16 link="https://github.com/oeyoews" /> {{!!creator}}  <$list filter="[all[current]has[created]]"> <$text text={{{[get[ocreated]else[👉]]}}} /> created <$view field="created" format="date" template="YYYY/0MM/0DD"/>   <$list filter="[all[current]has[modified]]"> <$text text={{{[get[omodified]else[📝]]}}} /> modified <$view field="modified" format="relativedate" />   <$list filter="[all[current]has[description]]"> <$text text={{{[get[odescription]else[✅]]}}} /> {{!!description}}    <$list filter="[!is[system]!days:created[-300]] -[days:modified[-300]]" > <$list filter="[all[current]!is[system]has[created]]"> 🤖 此条目创建于 <$view field="created" format="date" template="YYYY/0MM/0DD"/> <$list filter="[all[current]!is[system]has[modified]]"> , 修改于 <$view field="modified" format="relativedate" /> , 内容可能已经不够准确， 请酌情参考 ⚠️   <$list filter="[all[current]!is[system]!is[binary]]"> <>
"},"$:/core/ui/ViewTemplate/tags":{"title":"$:/core/ui/ViewTemplate/tags","tags":"$:/tags/ViewTemplate","text":"
<$list filter="[all[current]tags[]limit[1]sort[title]]"> <$text text={{{ [[$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-tiddler-info/config]get[otags]else[🏷️]] }}} /> <$list filter="[all[current]tags[]sort[title]]" template="$:/core/ui/TagTemplate" storyview="pop"/>
"}}}
